DialogueNode.Text: Uh, is this the right place? Oh, you must be the therapist.

DialogueOption.Text: Yes I am. Tell me about your problem.
Yes I am here to solve your life problems.
Pay up first and we will see if you get anything from me.
Hmm... okay let me look at your medical history.
Hey, I am running a hot business here, so don't mess with me.

DialogueNode.Text: Oh sorry... I was thinking of something... Where were we?

DialogueOption.Text: You seem to have some trouble concentrating.
I feel your trouble. Tell me more.
Hey look me in the eyes and tell me what you see.

DialogueNode.Text: Sorry... maybe I shouldn't have come.

DialogueOption.Text: You seem to have some trouble concentrating.
I feel your trouble. Tell me more.
Hey look me in the eyes and tell me what you see.

DialogueNode.Text: Oh yeah... I guess? I mean... How can you focus when there's so many things in life.

DialogueOption.Text: Okay let me find out what's going on in your head. (end dialogue)

DialogueNode.Text: People say I don't listen to them. I mean... there's so many things I have to think about... how can I?

DialogueOption.Text: Okay let me find out what's going on in your head. (end dialogue)

DialogueNode.Text: Uh... I don't know. It's hard to concentrate right now. I think I might have left something at home.

DialogueOption.Text: Okay let me find out what's going on in your head. (end dialogue)
